station.name: SMHI Station ID (Stationsnummer)
station.description: The station ID (Stationsnummer) may be found in several places in the SHMI website. E.g. on https://smhi.se/data/meteorologi/ladda-ner-meteorologiska-observationer. Please make sure to choose an active station.

interval.name: Fetch interval (hours)
interval.description: How often to pull from the SMHI API. Please observer that no measurement is updated more than once per hour.
